author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

Following https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47280 (where the package was created), motivated by https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47175#pullrequestreview-2576400675. These three service base classes were "easy to move" from FWCore/Utilities. I envision two more PRs, one for `RandomNumberGenerator` and one for `JobReport`.

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1265

#### PR validation:

Code compiles
title: Move `CPUServiceBase`, `RootHandlers`, and `TimingServiceBase` to `FWCore/AbstractServices`
